title: I was smurfing in silver elo for my friend the other day and I'm starting to see repeating igns
body:
Is it just me or this game is kind of dying? Even in silver elo which is suppose to have the highest variance of players I am starting to see them a few days later of queueing up... lol 

I kind of wish riot post their amount of players so I can actually see if people are not playing league as much.
